name: Kakuna
author: Midori Harada
flavor_text: While awaiting evolution, it hides from predators under leaves and in nooks of branches.

poke_body.name: Exoskeleton
poke_body.effect: Any damage done to Kakuna by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Dangerous Evolution
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for an Evolution card that evolves from Kakuna and put it onto Kakuna. (This counts as evolving Kakuna.) Shuffle your deck afterward.
